description: This file defines a React functional component named GridCanvas that renders various demonstrations of CSS Grid layouts, including guides, auto-flow, responsive spans, alignment variants, gap presets, and breakpoint previews. It imports external components and constants for grid configuration and content.

methods.name: GridCanvas({ config, styles })
methods.description: A React component that renders visual demonstrations and controls for CSS Grid features such as guides, auto-flow, responsive spans, alignment, gaps, and breakpoints.
